public class MustTextPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Markupable

A component to present a text information.

destroy

public void destroy()
Description copied from interface: Markupable
Destroys the markupable. Useful to release e.g. static references which prevent the garbage collector from finalizing. For example HalfDataComboBoxes add themeselves as Listeners to database changes. These listeners are registered statically. Thus, these listeners cannot be removed by the garbage collector, they have to be removed manually. This may be done by calling this destroy method.

Specified by:
destroy in interface Markupable
See Also:
Markupable.destroy()
